title: Korlash, Heir to Blackblade
text: Korlash, Heir to Blackblade's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Swamps you control.: Regenerate Korlash.Grandeur — Discard another card named Korlash, Heir to Blackblade: Search your library for up to two Swamp cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
